channel.title: Plugins on Henrique Dias
channel.description: Recent content in Plugins on Henrique Dias

item.title: GitHub Profile Widget for WordPress
item.author: hacdias@gmail.com (Henrique Dias)
item.description: Luís Soares and I have created two plugins for WordPress: one for HackerRank and another for IMDb. Today, we announce a new plugin for WordPress which has been available since last month: GitHub Profile Widget. Even the developers should have an easy way to show their work on their own blog. So we created this brand new plugin for WordPress. This plugin gives you a widget to show your GitHub profile or an organization’s profile in your blog.

item.title: Your IMDb Profile, on your WordPress website
item.author: hacdias@gmail.com (Henrique Dias)
item.description: A few months ago, Luís Soares and I created a plugin for WordPress entirely dedicated to HackerRank. The main functionality of that plugin is to show a mini version of your HackerRank profile on your website as a widget. Now, we created a new one. Not for HackerRank, but for IMDb. Yes, you read correctly! For that amazing service which let us know more about (almost) any movie and serie. We called it IMDb Profile Widget!
